home.name: Erick Solis
home.title: Full Stack Developer
home.bio1: Hello! I'm Erick Solis, a full-stack developer who is passionate about creating innovative and useful web solutions.
home.bio2: I have experience in frontend and backend technologies, combining creativity, logic, and design to build functional and scalable applications.
home.bio3: I consider myself proactive, results-oriented, and committed to quality and continuous improvement.

list.title: Book Platform
list.shortDescription: Web platform for registering and managing books with user authentication.
list.longDescription: Book Platform is an application designed to help users organize and manage their own digital library. It allows users to easily register books, keep them organized in an intuitive dashboard, and access them at any time. In addition, it offers a personalized experience where each user can manage only their own books after registering and logging in. The platform aims to be a practical solution for those who want to have control over their reading and keep track of their collection in a clear and accessible way.

list.title: Explorify
list.shortDescription: Web application for creating, editing, and exploring collaborative articles about travel.
list.longDescription: Explorify is a collaborative web application designed for users to share and discover travel experiences. It allows users to create, edit, and explore articles about destinations or tourist tips, encouraging participation within a digital community. Each user has secure authentication and a badge system that recognizes their activity. The platform is developed with ReactJS, NodeJS, Express, and MongoDB, and integrates a rich text editor with React Quill. Explorify seeks to connect people through real stories and promote the exchange of knowledge about the world of travel.

about.title: About Me
about.name: Erick Solis
about.description: I am a software developer with a passion for creating solutions that bring real value to people. I enjoy understanding user needs and transforming ideas into functional, accessible, and well-designed applications. I am currently seeking my first professional opportunity as a Full Stack Developer, in an environment where I can learn, contribute, and continue to grow. I am constantly learning and committed to quality, innovation, and continuous improvement.
